Product Description

This sunscreen not only protects your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays but also hydrates your skin without making it feel sticky. With Ultra Boot-star rating of 5 it offers the highest possible UVA protection against tanning and ageing due to sun exposure. column17:
Product Description

This sunscreen provides effective protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays. It prevents sunburn and skin ageing due to sun exposure. This lightweight non-greasy formula hydrates your skin and spreads easily leaving a matte finish on your face. It is perfume free and is recommended for daily use. It is safe for sensitive skin. HOW TO USE Should be applied at least 20 minutes before sun exposure. After cleansing dispense an adequate amount of cream on your hand. Massage gently onto your skin in an upward and outward motion.
